posts.post_content:
I have decided to change direction in my card collecting.  My heart is just not in this set anymore and I have begun selling off cards I have.

Clark Griffith Sweet Caporal with bat 350/30 PSA 2 $75.00
Miller Huggins Sweet Caporal hands at Mouth SGC 45  $130.00
Nap Lajoie Piedmont Portrait  PSA 1.5  $190.00 
John McGraw Sweet Caporal Finger in Air SGC 30 $75.00

Shipping will be $5.00, but I will cover for purchase of 3 or more cards.  Paypal Friends and Family is preferred. Any questions email me at [url]daveyjsc@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks DAVE
I have these 4 cards left. Any questions or if you want scans email me [url]daveyjsc@yahoo.com[/url]
